about_the_game:
Kalasta is a roguelite deckbuilder fish game with real time strategy mechanics. Use your cards to spawn, feed and empower your fish throughout waves of invading enemies. Collect coins to use on upgrading your deck and purchasing items with unique abilities.

Kalasta plays like a combination of Insaniquarium and a roguelite deckbuilding game. The waves of enemies will provide a challenge if you don't nurture your aquarium of fish but each run provides a unique experience. Unlock new cards and items to give your fish a fighting chance.

Features:

  • Collect cards and items to spawn fish, gain gold or activate unique abilities.
  • Grow and raise fish by feeding them with food related cards.
  • Fight enemies with your fish army and play cards to turn the tide of battle.
  • Unlock leaders to start each run with a unique experience.
  • Fast paced card game where you have to play cards in real time.
